title: ‘Amid the ashes’ of the 2025 LA wildfires – This Week in Cleantech
description: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Justin Worland from TIME Magazine discusses the fires that hit Los Angeles in January 2025, and how to prevent similar disasters in the future.
content: On this episode of the This Week in Cleantech podcast, Justin Worland from TIME Magazine discusses the fires that hit Los Angeles in January 2025, and how to prevent similar disasters in the future.
